Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Annotation Types
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.grouplens.lenskit.collections.FastCollection
    Just implement FastIterable.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.collections.FastIterable
    Fast iteration has gone away.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.util.Index
    Use IdIndexMapping instead.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.grouplens.lenskit.collections.CopyingFastCollection
    Fast iteration is going away.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.data.dao.DelimitedTextRatingCursor
    Use the code in org.grouplens.lenskit.data.text.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.cli.EvalCLI
    Use lenskit eval from the lenskit-cli package.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.vectors.ImmutableVec
    Use vectorz instead.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.util.Indexer
    Use MutableIdIndexMapping instead.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.vectors.MutableVec
    Use vectorz instead.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.data.dao.SimpleFileItemDAOProvider
    Use SimpleFileItemDAOProvider instead.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.data.dao.SimpleFileRatingDAO
    Use TextEventDAO instead.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.data.dao.SimpleFileUserDAOProvider
    Use SimpleFileUserDAOProvider instead.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.vectors.Vec
    Use vectorz instead.
  • Deprecated Annotation Types 
    Annotation Type and Description
    org.grouplens.lenskit.data.dao.ItemFile
    Use org.grouplens.lenskit.data.text instead.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.data.dao.UserFile
    Use org.grouplens.lenskit.data.text instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.traintest.TrainTestEvalTask.addWritePredictionChannel(Symbol, String)
    Use the predictions metric.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.core.LenskitConfiguration.buildGraph()
    This shouldn't be used anymore.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.collections.CollectionUtils.emptyFastCollection()
    Just use a standard empty collection.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.cursors.AbstractCursor.fast()
    org.grouplens.lenskit.cursors.Cursor.fast()
    Fast iteration is going away.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.vectors.SparseVector.fast()
    Fast iteration is going away.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.collections.CollectionUtils.fast(Iterable<E>)
    Fast iteration has gone away. This method now does nothing.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.vectors.SparseVector.fast(VectorEntry.State)
    Fast iteration is going away.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.collections.CollectionUtils.fastFilterAndLimit(Iterable<E>, Predicate<? super E>, int)
    Fast iteration has gone away.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.collections.FastIterable.fastIterator()
    Fast iteration has gone away.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.scored.PackedScoredIdList.fastIterator()
    org.grouplens.lenskit.vectors.SparseVector.fastIterator()
    Fast iteration is going away.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.vectors.SparseVector.fastIterator(VectorEntry.State)
    Fast iteration is going away.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.cursors.AbstractCursor.fastNext()
    org.grouplens.lenskit.cursors.AbstractPollingCursor.fastNext()
    org.grouplens.lenskit.cursors.Cursor.fastNext()
    Fast iteration is going away
    org.grouplens.lenskit.inject.RecommenderInstantiator.forConfig(LenskitConfiguration)
    org.grouplens.lenskit.knn.item.model.ItemItemBuildContext.getItemPairIterator()
    This will go away in LensKit 3.0.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.knn.item.model.ItemItemBuildContext.getItemPairs()
    This will go away in LensKit 3.0.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.core.LenskitConfigContext.in(Annotation, Class<?>)
    org.grouplens.lenskit.inject.AbstractConfigContext.in(Annotation, Class<?>)
    org.grouplens.lenskit.core.LenskitConfigContext.in(Class<?>)
    org.grouplens.lenskit.inject.AbstractConfigContext.in(Class<?>)
    org.grouplens.lenskit.core.LenskitConfigContext.in(Class<? extends Annotation>, Class<?>)
    org.grouplens.lenskit.inject.AbstractConfigContext.in(Class<? extends Annotation>, Class<?>)
    org.grouplens.lenskit.util.io.LKFileUtils.isCompressed(File)
    Use CompressionMode or commons-compress facilities instead.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.config.ConfigurationLoader.load(Closure<?>)
    Use ConfigHelpers.load(groovy.lang.Closure) instead.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.core.LenskitRecommenderEngine.load(File, ClassLoader)
    Use LenskitRecommenderEngineLoader for sophisticated loading.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.core.LenskitRecommenderEngine.load(InputStream, ClassLoader)
    Use LenskitRecommenderEngineLoader for sophisticated loading.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.config.ConfigHelpers.load(String)
    Loading from Groovy source strings is confusing.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.config.ConfigurationLoader.load(String)
    Loading from Groovy sources as strings is confusing.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.ExecutionInfo.Builder.setAlgoAttributes(Map<String, Object>)
    org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.ExecutionInfo.Builder.setAlgoName(String)
    org.grouplens.lenskit.data.source.CSVDataSourceBuilder.setCache(boolean)
    org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.traintest.TrainTestEvalTask.setIsolate(boolean)
    Isolate data sets instead.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.traintest.TrainTestEvalTask.setPredictOutput(File)
    org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.traintest.TrainTestEvalTask.setPredictOutput(String)
    org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.algorithm.AlgorithmInstanceBuilder.setPreload(boolean)
    This method doesn't do anything anymore. Pack rating data if you want preloading.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.algorithm.AlgorithmInstanceBuilderDelegate.setPreload(boolean)
    org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.traintest.TrainTestEvalTask.setRecommendOutput(File)
    org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.traintest.TrainTestEvalTask.setRecommendOutput(String)
    org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.data.crossfold.CrossfoldTask.setSplitUsers(boolean)
    Use CrossfoldTask.setMethod(CrossfoldMethod) instead.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.grouplens.lenskit.data.dao.DelimitedTextRatingCursor(BufferedReader, String, String)
    Inheriting from this class is deprecated.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.data.dao.EventCollectionDAO(Collection<? extends Event>)
    use EventCollectionDAO.create(Collection) instead
    org.grouplens.lenskit.data.sql.JDBCRatingDAO(Connection, SQLStatementFactory)
    Use JDBCRatingDAO.newBuilder().
    org.grouplens.lenskit.data.sql.JDBCRatingDAO(Connection, SQLStatementFactory, boolean)
    Use JDBCRatingDAO.newBuilder().
    org.grouplens.lenskit.knn.item.model.SimilarityMatrixModel(LongKeyDomain, List<ImmutableSparseVector>)
    This is deprecated for public usage. It is better to use the other constructor.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.data.dao.SimpleFileRatingDAO(File, String, CompressionMode)
    use SimpleFileRatingDAO.create(File, String, CompressionMode) instead.
